item.title: Football
item.description: Displays Football statistics about the specific league. This widget uses football-data.org. Standings Standings is the ranking or table for specific league. By default it shows top 5 teams in the league but which can be customized using configuration. Matches Played Shows recent matches played in the specific league. By default it shows matches played in last 5 days. Upcoming Matches Shows upcoming matches or fixtuers in the specific league. By default it shows upcoming matches for next 5 days.

item.title: NBA Score
